metadata.description: Ligamentous reflexes safeguarding spinal, costal, and pelvic junctions within the torso.
metadata.notes: New streamlined registry isolating ligament tension sensors so stability solvers can ingest them without muscular noise.

iliolumbar_guard.stimulus: Rapid torsion or lateral flexion stressing the iliolumbar ligaments.
iliolumbar_guard.afferent: Ligament mechanoreceptors projecting to L3-L5 dorsal horn.
iliolumbar_guard.integration: Lumbar interneuron matrix gating quadratus lumborum and gluteal activation.
iliolumbar_guard.efferent: Lumbar motor pools to deep lateral stabilizers and gluteus medius fibers.
iliolumbar_guard.effector: Counter-rotation and pelvic brace preventing sacroiliac shear.
iliolumbar_guard.notes: Exposes pelvis brace envelopes for torso/hip rig blending.

costotransverse_check.stimulus: Excessive posterior rib excursion stretching costotransverse ligaments.
costotransverse_check.afferent: Upper thoracic ligament receptors and intercostal afferents â†’ dorsal horn.
costotransverse_check.integration: Thoracic interneurons modulating extensor inhibition and intercostal balance.
costotransverse_check.efferent: Segmental motor drive biasing rib depressors and limiting erector spinae output.
costotransverse_check.effector: Dampened rib elevation with controlled thoracic rollback.
costotransverse_check.notes: Keeps rib articulation within safe arc for breathing rigs under load.

sacroiliac_lock.stimulus: Vertical impact transmitted through pelvis compressing sacroiliac ligaments.
sacroiliac_lock.afferent: Sacroiliac ligament mechanoreceptors entering sacral dorsal roots.
sacroiliac_lock.integration: Sacral and lower lumbar interneurons co-activating pelvic floor and hip extensors.
sacroiliac_lock.efferent: Gluteal and pelvic floor motor outputs with sympathetic co-activation.
sacroiliac_lock.effector: Momentary stiffening of sacroiliac joint with posterior chain engagement.
sacroiliac_lock.notes: Routes impact buffering cues for seated/landing animations.
